AkOutputSettings Struct Reference

Platform-independent initialization settings of output devices. More...

List of all members.

Public Attributes

AkPanningRule ePanningRule
AkChannelConfig channelConfig
 Channel configuration for this output. Call AkChannelConfig::Clear() to let the engine use the default output configuration. Hardware might not support the selected configuration.
AkCreatePluginCallback pfSinkPluginFactory
 Custom sink plugin factory. Pass the creation function of your implementation of AK::IAkSinkPlugin. Pass NULL to use built-in sinks (default).
